TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Cikasuwan, title = Cikasuwan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cikasuwan} }

S.FORM: Cikasuwan itiya ho, mikowanay to Taywan ko Dipon, Itiniay i Ji'an Cen no Hualien ko Cikasuwan a niyaro', 680 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 1,799 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 38% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 677 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 62% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 1,122 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 29%, Truku 5%, Tayal 1%, Bunun 1%, roma 1%.

Cikasowan itiya ho, mikowanay to Taywan ko Dipon, Itiniay i Ji'an Cen no Hoalien ko Cikasowan a niyaro', 680 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 1,799 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 38% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 677 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 62% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 1,122 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 29%, Troko 5%, Tayal 1%, Bonon 1%, roma 1%.
